name: THE BEAST THAT LURKS
description:
A small little horror game I made in about 4 hours. Plan to add more.

THIS IS A HORROR GAME

CONTAINS JUMPSCARES & POSSIBLE EPILEPTIC WARNING 

if you are easily frightened by jump-scares or have epilepsy please do not play this game. thank you for understanding.

Controls:
Arrow keys / WASD to move

Sound Effects From:
https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/jumpscare/
https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/horror/

Thx 4 Playing!

-/-/-/-Game Pillow
